backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing product catalog and shopping cart functionality with in-memory storage for products and carts, including CRUD operations and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: replacing Vanguard logo with TS Gabrielle logos (theme-aware) and updating all Vanguard branding references to TS Gabrielle throughout the application.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the React application structure, components, pages, hooks, and styling for the TS Gabrielle fashion e-commerce site.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with comprehensive design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'TS Gabrielle Fashion' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, and cart pages, all wrapped in the Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product image, details, size/color, quantity controls with increment/decrement buttons, price calculation, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroCarousel.tsx: Fullscreen auto-playing carousel with three hero slides featuring images, titles, subtitles, navigation arrows, and dot indicators with smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header featuring theme-aware TS Gabrielle logo (purple for light, white for dark), navigation links, cart icon with item count badge, mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component with hover effects, product image, name, and price display that navigates to product detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductGallery.t: React component that displays a product image gallery with a main image view and thumbnail navigation grid. Supports multiple images with selection state and highlights the active thumbnail.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the ICP backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Custom hook providing cart functionality including fetching cart data, adding items, updating quantities, and removing items. Uses localStorage to persist a unique user ID and React Query for state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides context for authentication status and identity access throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Custom hooks for fetching product data from the backend actor using React Query. Provides useProducts for all products and useProduct for individual product lookup by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a design system with light and dark mode color schemes. Uses a purple-based color palette (#a932bd) as the primary brand color.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication. Renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page component displaying cart items with quantity controls and removal options. Shows empty state with call-to-action and calculates order total from cart items and product data.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component featuring a hero carousel, brand messaging about empowering transwomen through fashion, and three feature cards highlighting vanguardist design, artistic expression, and inclusive fashion.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page component that displays product information, image gallery, size/color selectors, and add-to-cart functionality with navigation back to product listing.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Product listing page component that displays all products in a responsive grid layout with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors (using OKLCH color space), typography, container settings, animations, and design tokens for the application.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting the e-commerce platform for transwomen fashion with brand color #a932bd, existing features including homepage carousel, product pages, shopping cart, and TS Gabrielle branding.
